Sequence Information.Target Organism: [Ref.24211081] Gram-positive bacteria :Staphylococcus epidermidis(MIC=2.0 mg/L), Staphylococcus aureus(MIC=31.3 mg/L);Gram-negative bacteria :Escherichia coli(MIC=15.6 mg/L), Pseudomonas aeruginosa(MIC=62.5 mg/L);Fungi :Candida albicans(MIC=125 mg/L)
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: [Ref.24211081] HC10>125 mg/L against rabbit red blood cells
Sequence Information.Cytotoxicity: No cytotoxicity information found in the reference(s) presented
Sequence Information.Function: Antibacterial activity against Gram-positive bacteria and Gram-negative bacteria. Antifungal activity against Candida albicans

Literature.Title: Effect of stereochemistry, chain length and sequence pattern on antimicrobial properties of short synthetic β-sheet forming peptide amphiphiles.
Literature.Author: Ong ZY, Cheng J, Huang Y, Xu K, Ji Z, Fan W, Yang YY
